The Anvil 980 T-shirt is typically considered a classic fit. It has a straight cut and is designed to provide a comfortable, relaxed fit that is not too tight or too loose. The classic fit of the Anvil 980 T-shirt makes it a versatile option that can be worn in a variety of settings and styles.

That being said, the fit of the shirt can depend on individual body shape and personal preferences. If you prefer a more fitted or slim look, you may want to size down or consider a different style or brand that offers a slimmer fit. Conversely, if you prefer a looser, more relaxed fit, you may want to size up or consider a different style or brand that offers a more oversized fit.

Overall, the Anvil 980 T-shirt is designed to provide a classic, comfortable fit that can work well for a variety of body types and styles.
